oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Claisen rearrangement and ring-closing metathesis combination is finding its way in designing intricate targets. We have assembled cyclophanes via Claisen rearrangement, and ring-closing metathesis as key steps.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF THE INDIAN CHEMICAL SOCIETY, 92(8)1299-1311
